channel.title: Want your question answered sooner? Have a descriptive thread title!
channel.description:
I noticed lately that it's worse than ever before.
Thread titles like 'HELP!', 'Coding', 'PLZZ!', 'HURRY IMPORTANT!', 'NEED ANSWER QUICK' are not acceptable. If you want the right people (that know what they're doing) to answer your post, give them some information so that they know what the thread is about before clicking on it. If I know how to add a pvp box, and your question is that, but your thread title is 'HELP!', chances are I will not even look at your thread, and you lost the possible answer right there. However if your thread title is 'How do I add a PVP Box?', I can look at it, say 'I know how to do this!' and reply to your thread with the answer.
Summary: Please make your thread titles more specific.
PS - This is in addition to [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,375275.0.html]this post[/url], which talks about having descriptive questions inside your threads.

item.title: Want your question answered sooner? Have a descriptive thread title!
item.dc:creator: @ranger_squad ranger squad
item.description:
@ranger_squad wrote:

[quote=“usman555, post:11, topic:351075”][quote author=ranger squad link=topic=447431.msg3284041#msg3284041 date=1280084672]
Usman555, you bloody hypocrite:

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars


[/quote]That was 24 days ago, I’m pretty sure I can find one of your topics aswell[/quote]

Please do, I’ve posted 6 threads since November.

Read full topic
item.source: Want your question answered sooner? Have a descriptive thread title!

item.title: Want your question answered sooner? Have a descriptive thread title!
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“deathschaos9, post:13, topic:351075”]Well, I guess that kinda depends on how you read it. I don’t think I NEED HELP PLEASE!!! EASY HELP is “completely relevant to the topic at hand” :|[/quote]Well the poster needs ‘help’

But either way, people aren’t listening to the rule. I think the staff should make it easier to see (I mean seriously, not many people read all of the rules) or start enforcing it.

Read full topic

item.title: Want your question answered sooner? Have a descriptive thread title!
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

deathschaos9:

[quote][size=11pt]5.[/size] Make sure the titles of your topics are easy to read and are completely relevant to the topic at hand. Though this rule may be bent from time to time, make sure you follow it. A moderator on a bad day could easily lock a topic for breaking this rule.

Kudos for elaborating on a rule David
I’m getting pissed at the irrelevant thread titles as well, that and the lack of the basic information we need to help people…[/quote]Technically the ‘Help’ thread titles are easy to read and are relevant, they just aren’t descriptive.

Read full topic

Kudos for elaborating on a rule David :P I'm getting pissed at the irrelevant thread titles as well, that and the lack of the basic information we need to help people...

item.title: Want your question answered sooner? Have a descriptive thread title!
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“CreatorAlex, post:2, topic:351075”]I do hope they read this. It’s probably why they don’t always get answers.

Though, I bet half the community won’t pay a bit of attention.[/quote]And they wonder why nobody answers their question. Then a few days later they post the same question with the thread title: ‘WHY DOES NOONE HELP ME?!’

I hope this starts to get enforced really.
